@description.name: @description
@description.body: Objects which are used as delegates for the {@link qx.ui.mobile.list.List#delegate} may implement any of the methods described in this interface. The delegate does not need to implement all the methods of this interface. If a method is not implemented the {@link qx.ui.mobile.list.provider.Provider} provides a default implementation. Note: This interface is meant to document the delegate but should not be listed in the implement key of a class unless all methods are actually implemented.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Configure the list item renderer with the given data. Mandatory method. At least this method has to be defined for the delegate.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.mobile.list.renderer.Abstract} Instance of list item renderer to modify
@param.description: Instance of list item renderer to modify

@param.name: @param
@param.body: data {var} The data of the row. Can be used to configure the given item.
@param.description: The data of the row. Can be used to configure the given item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates an instance of the item renderer to use.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.list.renderer.Abstract} An instance of the item renderer.
@return.description: An instance of the item renderer.
